languages.text: Лорд-капитану удалось избежать гибели и найти безопасное укрытие... в той или иной мере. Теперь е{mf|му|й} предстоит обдумать свои следующие шаги.
The Lord Captain has narrowly managed to escape death and find a safe shelter... of sorts. Now {mf|he|she} needs to plan {mf|his|her} next steps.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитану удалось избежать гибели и найти безопасное укрытие... в той или иной мере. Теперь е{mf|му|й} предстоит обдумать свои следующие шаги.

traits.locale_text: Lord Captain has narrowly managed to escape death and find a safe shelter... of sorts. Now {mf|he|she} needs to plan {mf|his|her} further actions.
The Lord Captain has narrowly managed to escape death and find a safe shelter... of sorts. Now {mf|he|she} needs to plan {mf|his|her} next steps.
The Lord Captain has narrowly managed to escape death and find a safe shelter... of sorts. Now {mf|he|she} needs to plan {mf|his|her} next steps.

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a échappé de justesse à la mort et trouvé un abri sûr... en quelque sorte. Il lui faut désormais décider de ce qu'il convient de faire.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has narrowly managed to escape death and find a safe shelter... of sorts. Now {mf|he|she} needs to plan {mf|his|her} next steps.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a échappé de justesse à la mort et trouvé un abri sûr... en quelque sorte. Il lui faut désormais décider de ce qu'il convient de faire.

languages.text: 行商浪人死里逃生，找到了某种意义上……算是安全的避难所。如今，{mf|他|她}需要计划接下来的行动。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has narrowly managed to escape death and find a safe shelter... of sorts. Now {mf|he|she} needs to plan {mf|his|her} next steps.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人死里逃生，找到了某种意义上……算是安全的避难所。如今，{mf|他|她}需要计划接下来的行动。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは辛うじて死から逃れ、安全な避難場所と思しき場所を見つけることができた。今度は、次の手を考える必要がある。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has narrowly managed to escape death and find a safe shelter... of sorts. Now {mf|he|she} needs to plan {mf|his|her} next steps.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは辛うじて死から逃れ、安全な避難場所と思しき場所を見つけることができた。今度は、次の手を考える必要がある。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain konnte knapp dem Tod entgehen und ein einigermaßen sicheres Versteck finden. Nun muss er seine nächsten Schritte planen.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has narrowly managed to escape death and find a safe shelter... of sorts. Now {mf|he|she} needs to plan {mf|his|her} next steps.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain konnte knapp dem Tod entgehen und ein einigermaßen sicheres Versteck finden. Nun muss er seine nächsten Schritte planen.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ha logrado escapar de la muerte y encontrar un lugar seguro... relativamente. Ahora debe planificar sus siguientes acciones.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has narrowly managed to escape death and find a safe shelter... of sorts. Now {mf|he|she} needs to plan {mf|his|her} next steps.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ha logrado escapar de la muerte y encontrar un lugar seguro... relativamente. Ahora debe planificar sus siguientes acciones.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, ölümden kıl payı kurtulup güvenli bir sığınak bulmayı başardı. Şimdi sıradaki adımlarını planlamalı.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has narrowly managed to escape death and find a safe shelter... of sorts. Now {mf|he|she} needs to plan {mf|his|her} next steps.
